    • Method Detail

      • readCameraImage

        public byte[] readCameraImage()
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Gets the current image, from either FlyCamera or SimCamera. Also invalidates the current version of the processed/rendering images.
        Specified by:
        readCameraImage in interface CarControl
        Returns:
        The image as a Bayer-8 encoded byte array.

      • getRecentCameraImage

        public byte[] getRecentCameraImage()
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Gets the most recent camera image as loaded from readCameraImage.
        Specified by:
        getRecentCameraImage in interface CarControl
        Returns:
        The most recent camera image as a Bayer-8 encoded byte array.

      • getProcessedImage

        public byte[] getProcessedImage()
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Gets a processed image. This should be processed and set through setCameraImage. If not, an exception may be thrown.
        Specified by:
        getProcessedImage in interface CarControl
        Returns:
        The processed image in the form of a simple color raster array.

      • setProcessedImage

        public void setProcessedImage(byte[] image)
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Sets the processed image.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getRenderedImage

        protected int[] getRenderedImage()
        Gets the image to be rendered on the screen. Normally should not be used by any class except the renderer itself.
        Returns:
        The image to be rendered on the TrakSim window.

      • setRenderedImage

        public void setRenderedImage(int[] renderedImage)
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Sets the image to be rendered on the screen. Note that this will do nothing if there is no screen/window to draw on (willPaint returns false).
        Specified by:
        setRenderedImage in interface CarControl
        Parameters:
        renderedImage - The image to render on the screen as an RGB integer array.

      • willPaint

        public boolean willPaint()
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Checks if this car control will paint (if there is a screen/window to draw on).
        Specified by:
        willPaint in interface CarControl
        Returns:
        Whether or not the car control will paint.

        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Accelerates the car.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • rectFill

        public void rectFill(int colo,
                     int rx,
                     int cx,
                     int rz,
                     int c)
        Description copied from interface: CarControl
        Draws a rectangle on the screen (if one exists).
        Specified by:
        rectFill in interface CarControl
        Parameters:
        colo - The pixel color to fill that rectangle, = 0x00RRGGBB
        rx - The pixel row in one corner
        cx - The pixel column in the same corner
        rz - The pixel row in the other corner (inclusive)
        c - The pixel column there
        See Also:
        TrakSim.RectFill(int, int, int, int, int)
